recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, and bacon.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a separate bowl, whisk eggs and cheese. Fry bacon until crispy. Mix the pasta with bacon and then quickly add the egg mixture.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: A flavorful Indian curry made with chicken marinated in spices and yogurt.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Fry onions until translucent. Add tomatoes and chicken. Simmer for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Guacamole
recipes.description: A creamy avocado dip originated from Mexico.
recipes.instructions: Mash avocados. Chop tomatoes and onions finely. Mix all ingredients together. Squeeze lime juice on top.

recipes.title: Beef Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and delicious stir-fried beef with vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Cut beef into thin slices. Mix with cornstarch. Slice vegetables. Stir-fry beef for 2 minutes. Add vegetables and sauces.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Crispy fish served in a tortilla with salsa.
recipes.instructions: Fry fish until crispy. Place on tortillas. Top with chopped tomatoes, onions, and coriander. Squeeze lime juice on top.

recipes.title: Cheese Omelette
recipes.description: Fluffy eggs with melted cheese inside.
recipes.instructions: Whisk eggs. Melt butter in a pan. Pour eggs into the pan. When almost set, sprinkle cheese on one side and fold.

recipes.title: BBQ Ribs
recipes.description: Tender pork ribs with a smoky barbecue sauce.
recipes.instructions: Rub ribs with salt, pepper, and sugar. Grill for 30 minutes. Coat with BBQ sauce and grill for another 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Pizza
recipes.description: Crispy pizza crust topped with your favorite veggies.
recipes.instructions: Roll out pizza dough. Spread sauce on top. Add toppings and cheese. Bake at 220°C for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Brownies
recipes.description: Rich and fudgy brownies with a crackly top.
recipes.instructions: Melt chocolate and butter. Mix eggs and sugar. Combine all ingredients. Pour into a baking dish and bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Mango Lassi
recipes.description: A refreshing Indian yogurt-based drink with mangoes.
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients together until smooth.
